: : Darkangel : :
Darkangel: Well, no I'm not the leader. His name is Tyrael. And we answer to the Trpredacus Council on Cybertron. Although I'm sure you would like my allies.
Darkangel takes DeathSteel's hand.
 "raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...>" <raccoon7679@...> wrote:DeathSteel::
He weighed his options.  He could tell thus far that this bot was 
fiercely loyal to the faction he was currently with. Darkangel's 
words also told him that the once mighty rules, the Predacons, were 
now little more than an old glory tale to be told. If he was to rule 
this planet, he would have to work from the ground up. He smiled at 
Darkangel.  "Really? The Predacons are no more? I find this 
intrigueing. Tell me then Darkangel, since the Predacons are no 
longer the rulers and since the, uh,Tripredacus are in control, whom 
might the leader be? You? For you are a bot I can serve with. If the 
other bots in this Tripredacus are anything like you, then I would 
be honored to serve."  He bowed slightly to Darkangel and offered 
his hand to shake as an agreement for his joining the 
Tripredacus. "Allow me to fight with you. For the Maximals and the 
like are my sworn enemy."  He clutched his hands into fists and 
lowered his voice to a low growl,"I will see them stamped out. This 
I have sworn."  He drew himself in for a second and regained his 
more polite composure. "Please, allow me to fight with you." he said 
extending his hand again.




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> : : Darkangel : :
> The bat bot was both flattered and angered by DeathSteel's words. 
Did he thin him unloyal?
> Darkangel: Squander? I think not. I have no wish to join the 
Predacons..., a dieing faction of Transformers. I serve the 
Tripredacus. If you were smart you would be with us. We rule 
Cybertron, and will eventually win this war. Then we will be the 
rulers of all Transformers.
